Module pimperium
Package pimperium.utils

Class Possibilities

java.lang.Object
pimperium.utils.Possibilities
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Possibilities extends Object implements Serializable
Singleton class used to generate all the possible moves for multiple actions
See Also:
